content.rendered:
Advanced Excel Course

Advanced Excel course enhance your skill which require in every company. Vmaxinfo Instituteoffer Advance Excel course from very basic concepts. Whether you’re a seasoned Excel user or just getting started, this course will elevate your skills to new heights. Learn advanced techniques, functions, and best practices to handle complex data, streamline workflows, and create powerful data analysis and visualization tools.

Advanced Excel Course Details:

Excel Fundamentals

  • Excel Basics
  • Navigating the Ribbon and Menus
  • Keyboard Shortcuts for Efficiency
  • Working with Worksheets and Workbooks

Advanced Data Analysis

  • Advanced Sorting and Filtering
  • Subtotaling and Grouping Data
  • Data Validation and Drop-Down Lists
  • What-If Analysis with Data Tables

Advanced Functions and Formulas

  • Logical Functions (IF, AND, OR)
  • Lookup and Reference Functions (VLOOKUP, HLOOKUP, INDEX, MATCH)
  • Text and Date Functions

PivotTables and PivotCharts

  • Creating and Customizing PivotTables
  • Slicers and Timelines
  • PivotChart Creation
  • Advanced PivotTable Techniques

Advanced Charting

  • Customizing Chart Elements
  • Advanced Chart Types
  • Dynamic Charts and Data Labels
  • Charting Best Practices

Data Validation and Protection

  • Advanced Data Validation Rules
  • Worksheet Protection
  • Workbook Protection
  • Password Protecting Excel Files

Advanced Data Analysis with What-If Scenarios

  • Goal Seek and Scenario Manager
  • Solver Add-In for Optimization
  • Advanced What-If Analysis Techniques
  • Building Decision Support Models

Real-world Excel Projects

  • Complex Data Analysis Projects
  • Dashboard Creation
  • Customized Reporting
  • Project Management in Excel

Duration: 1 Month

  • Daily 1 Hrs
  • Week End Extra Practice
  • Week End Batches are also available.

Course Benefits:

  • Hands-on exercises and practical projects
  • Real-world datasets for analysis and reporting
  • Quizzes and assessments for tracking progress
  • Support from an online community forum
  • Course completion certificate

Prerequisites: Participants should have a solid understanding of basic Excel functions and operations. This course is designed for intermediate to advanced Excel users.

Who can do Advance Excel Course:

  • Business professionals seeking advanced Excel skills
  • Data analysts and financial analysts
  • Project managers and decision-makers
  • Anyone looking to maximize Excel’s capabilities for data analysis and reporting

Search Jobs on Advanced Excel
